sen.j: 保安 (元号)3年（1122年）に叙爵してから累進し、丹波守・侍従・因幡守・右近衛少将・右近衛中将などを歴任。
sen.e: He had promoted successively since ennoblement in 1122, he experienced Tanba no kami (the governor of Tanba Province), jiju (a chamberlain), Inaba no kami (the governor of Inaba Province), Ukone no shosho (a minor captain of the Right Division of Inner Palace Guards), Ukone no chujo (a middle captain of the Right Division of Inner Palace Guards).
